name: smart-sync-google-calendars
description: Smart sync multiple Google calendars into one unified calendar using Google Apps Script

scripts.deploy: cd scripts && npx clasp push && cd ..
scripts.clasp:create: cd scripts && npx clasp create --title "Smart Sync Google Calendars" --rootDir . && cd ..
scripts.clasp:open: cd scripts && npx clasp open && cd ..
scripts.clasp:logs: cd scripts && npx clasp logs && cd ..
scripts.clasp:pull: cd scripts && npx clasp pull && cd ..
scripts.clasp:version: cd scripts && npx clasp version && cd ..
scripts.clasp:deploy: cd scripts && npx clasp deploy && cd ..
